Sorry dude, I'm leaving town soon too.  Someone else will have to take Deathplague.  Really Sorry.

Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:I'll be gone from now to maybe sunday night. I'll try to post 
tonight, but I can't make any promises.

So, if I haven't replied by tonight, those people will take my chars.

Airly: Bloodblade

Robo: Tyrael

Jerame: Blackfang

Bustercross: Dreadplague

If you can't or don't want to, exchange with someone else.

Have a good week-end! I'll try to see if I can take pics from Quebec 
City! (If any Southerners speak about the cold though, I'll so 
slap 'em silly!=P)
